did.unittitle: Senator Heinz Rubnau Lecture to ILR Faculty
did.physdesc: Audio cassette tapes, audio open-reel tapes.
did.abstract: Senator Rubnau's February 28, 1972 lecture on the Federal Republic of Germany, to the ILR faculty.

defitem.label: Contact Information:
defitem.item: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives Martin P. Catherwood Library 227 Ives Hall Cornell University Ithaca, NY 14853 (607) 255-3183> kheel_center@cornell.edu http://www.ilr.cornell.edu/library/kheel

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Heinz Ruhnau was a West German politian. He was the Social Democratic Party of Germany Deputy State Chairman in Hamburg from 1966 to 1974. He was also a member of the Hamburg Parliament and from 1965 to 1973 he was Senator President of the Hamburg Ministry of the Interior.
